languages.text: {n}Фалько всматривается в ваше лицо с полминуты, а затем поднимает руки в примирительном жесте.{/n} "Лучше быть живым капером, чем дохлым почти-торговым-представителем. Благодарю за оказанную милость, Ваша Светлость. И пусть звезды благоволят вам".

{n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."
languages.original_text: {n}Фалько всматривается в ваше лицо с полминуты, а затем поднимает руки в примирительном жесте.{/n} "Лучше быть живым капером, чем дохлым почти-торговым-представителем. Благодарю за оказанную милость, Ваша Светлость. И пусть звезды благоволят вам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

{n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

{n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

{n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

languages.text: {n}法尔科盯着你看了很久，之后以和解的姿势举起双手。{/n}“好吧，当个活着的海盗，总比当个死了的贸易代表要强。我感谢您这小小的仁慈，大人。愿群星眷顾您。”
languages.original_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}法尔科盯着你看了很久，之后以和解的姿势举起双手。{/n}“好吧，当个活着的海盗，总比当个死了的贸易代表要强。我感谢您这小小的仁慈，大人。愿群星眷顾您。”

languages.text: {n}Falco starrt dich eine halbe Minute lang an, dann hebt er beschwichtigend die Hände.{/n} "Lieber ein lebender Freibeuter als ein toter Möchtegern-Handelsvertreter. Ich danke Euch für diese kleine Gnade, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und mögen die Sterne Euch ihre Gunst schenken."
languages.original_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco starrt dich eine halbe Minute lang an, dann hebt er beschwichtigend die Hände.{/n} "Lieber ein lebender Freibeuter als ein toter Möchtegern-Handelsvertreter. Ich danke Euch für diese kleine Gnade, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und mögen die Sterne Euch ihre Gunst schenken."

languages.text: {n}Falco vous dévisage un long moment avant de lever les mains en signe d'apaisement.{/n} « Mieux vaut être corsaire et vivre qu'aspirer à être représentant commercial et finir six pieds sous terre. Je vous remercie pour votre bienveillance, Votre Seigneurie. Que les étoiles veillent sur vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco vous dévisage un long moment avant de lever les mains en signe d'apaisement.{/n} « Mieux vaut être corsaire et vivre qu'aspirer à être représentant commercial et finir six pieds sous terre. Je vous remercie pour votre bienveillance, Votre Seigneurie. Que les étoiles veillent sur vous. »

languages.text: {n}Falco te mira durante medio minuto y levanta las manos en gesto conciliador.{/n} «Mejor ser un pirata vivo que un aspirante a representante comercial muerto. Le agradezco su compasión, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y le deseo que las estrellas le sean propicias».
languages.original_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco te mira durante medio minuto y levanta las manos en gesto conciliador.{/n} «Mejor ser un pirata vivo que un aspirante a representante comercial muerto. Le agradezco su compasión, mi{mf|lord|lady}, y le deseo que las estrellas le sean propicias».

languages.text: {n}ファルコはあなたを30秒睨みつけ、ゆっくりと両手を上げるジェスチャーをした。{/n}「貿易代表志願者として死ぬより、生きている私掠船の方がいい。陛下、このささやかな慈悲に感謝いたします。星々のご加護がありますように」
languages.original_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ファルコはあなたを30秒睨みつけ、ゆっくりと両手を上げるジェスチャーをした。{/n}「貿易代表志願者として死ぬより、生きている私掠船の方がいい。陛下、このささやかな慈悲に感謝いたします。星々のご加護がありますように」

languages.text: {n}Falco, yarım dakika kadar sana bakıp ardından uysal bir tavırla ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Elçi özentisi olarak ölmektense korsan olarak yaşarım ben de. Merhametin için teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Yıldızlar seninle olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Falco stares at you for half a minute, then raises his hands in a conciliatory gesture.{/n} "Better to be a living privateer than a dead wannabe trade representative. I thank you for this small mercy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and may the stars favour you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Falco, yarım dakika kadar sana bakıyor. Sonra uysal bir tavırla ellerini havaya kaldırıyor{/n} "Elçi özentisi olarak ölmektense korsan olarak yaşarım ben de. Merhametin için teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} hazretleri. Yıldızlar seninle olsun."
